statements: SELECT strategy_name, discount_rate FROM discount_strategies WHERE strategy_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM discount_strategies WHERE discount_rate > 0.10 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, end_date FROM discount_strategies WHERE end_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT strategy_id, start_date, end_date FROM discount_strategies WHERE discount_rate = 0.05;
SELECT * FROM discount_strategies WHERE strategy_name LIKE 'Summer%';
SELECT strategy_name, discount_rate FROM discount_strategies WHERE start_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM discount_strategies WHERE discount_rate > 0.10 ORDER BY strategy_id DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, end_date FROM discount_strategies WHERE end_date IS NOT NULL ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name, discount_rate FROM discount_strategies WHERE discount_rate BETWEEN 0.05 AND 0.10 ORDER BY strategy_id;
SELECT strategy_name, start_date, end_date FROM discount_strategies WHERE start_date < '2022-05-01' AND end_date > '2022-07-01';
SELECT * FROM loyalty_discounts;
SELECT discount_name, discount_percentage FROM loyalty_discounts;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, total_purchase_amount FROM customer_history;
SELECT last_purchase_date, loyalty_level FROM customer_history;
SELECT discount_name, start_date, end_date FROM loyalty_discounts;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_discounts WHERE discount_percentage > 0.10 ORDER BY discount_percentage DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, total_purchase_amount FROM customer_history WHERE total_purchase_amount < 5000 AND loyalty_level >= 3;
SELECT discount_name, start_date, end_date FROM loyalty_discounts WHERE start_date < CURRENT_DATE() AND end_date >= CURRENT_DATE();
SELECT * FROM customer_history WHERE last_purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY last_purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, total_purchase_amount, loyalty_level FROM customer_history WHERE loyalty_level IS NULL OR loyalty_level = 0 ORDER BY total_purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, order_date FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(order_id) AS total_orders FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(order_id) > 3;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, order_date, total_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-05-01';

SELECT customers.customer_name, products.product_name, orders.quantity, orders.total_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id INNER JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id WHERE orders.quantity >= 5 ORDER BY customers.customer_name ASC, products.product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, unit_price, stock_quantity FROM products WHERE stock_quantity < 10;
SELECT discount_id, discount_code, discount_percentage FROM discounts WHERE start_date <= CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email, loyalty_points FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, unit_price, stock_quantity FROM products WHERE unit_price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY stock_quantity ASC;
SELECT discount_code, discount_percentage, start_date, end_date FROM discounts WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Customers
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE loyalty_points > 100
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM Orders WHERE payment_status = TRUE
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price < 50.00
SELECT * FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE loyalty_points > 1000
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE loyalty_points <= 500 OR phone_number IS NULL
SELECT c.customer_name, o.order_date, o.total_amount FROM Customers c JOIN Orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id ORDER BY o.order_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT p.product_name, p.price FROM Products p WHERE p.price BETWEEN 10 AND 50
